slides.title: Welcome to your Cardano Foundation Identity Wallet
slides.description: An opensource mobile digital wallet that enables you to securely manage your own identity in a privacy-preserving and self-sovereign manner.

slides.title: Empowerment with Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI)
slides.description: Embrace SSI principles, store private keys locally in your mobile device's Hardware Security Module, and control your identity.

slides.title: Privacy & Security: Your Top Priorities
slides.description: Prioritize privacy and security with Decentralized Identifiers and Verifiable Credentials. Control your data, what you share, with whom, and for how long.

slides.title: Embrace Interoperability for a Wider Reach
slides.description: Supporting new and existing standards, ecosystems, and frameworks is crucial to achieving widespread adoption and seamless interoperability.

slides.title: Decentralize Your Digital Identity
slides.description: Traditional identity systems offer minimal control over your digital identifiers. Decentralized technology transfers ownership and control to you.

enterpasscode.title: Create a passcode
enterpasscode.description: Create a passcode to secure your wallet and to continue setting up your seed phrase

startover.label: I cant remember, can I start over?

paragraph.top: Think of your secret recovery phrase as a safety net for your identity. If you ever lose your phone or switch to a new wallet, this phrase will help you recover your identity.
paragraph.bottom: It's important to keep these words safe and sound! Store them in a secure location, like a password manager, and remember to never share them with anyone.

paragraph.top: Think of your secret recovery phrase as a safety net for your identity. If you ever lose your phone or switch to a new wallet, this phrase will help you recover your identity.
paragraph.bottom: It's important to keep these words safe and sound! Store them in a secure location, like a password manager, and remember to never share them with anyone.

paragraph.top: Restore a crypto account based on an existing seed phrase.

overlay.text: Press the 'view' button when you're ready to see your seed phrase. Remember to make sure nobody is looking!

confirm.text: Have you double-checked you've copied your seed phrase correctly?

exit.text: If you go back you will lose your current progress. Are you sure you want to do this?

toggle.text: Switching tabs will remove the words you have already entered, are you sire you want to switch?

verify.text: Your seed phrase couldn’t be verified. Please, try again or choose an alternative method
